statements: UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Inventory SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 0, price = 0 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE products SET price = 15.50 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE products SET quantity = 50 WHERE id = 102;
UPDATE orders SET quantity = 10 WHERE order_id = 201;

UPDATE categories SET category_name='Updated Category 1' WHERE category_id=1;
